      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EsriQuickStart.MyTouchListener(android.content.Context context, com.esri.android.map.MapView view)
      Override MapView's touch listener.

      Use setMyTouchListener() to start or override events, and setDrawType().

        Returns:

      • setDrawClearButton

        public void setDrawClearButton(android.widget.Button button)
        Let's you pass in a reference to a button that you want to use to clear the graphics layer used for drawing. MyTouchListener will toggle it on via setEnabled(true) when the user draws something.

        IMPORTANT: If you don't do this you'll get a nullPointerException.
        Parameters:
        button -
        See Also:
        clearDrawGraphicsLayer

      • clearDrawGraphicsLayer

        public void clearDrawGraphicsLayer()
        Clears all drawing graphics.

      • clearAllGraphics

        public void clearAllGraphics()
        Clears ALL graphics. Added at v1.2.
